Bash(python3 -c "
import numpy as np
things = np.load\('/mnt/afs/250010218/Brain2Image/datasets/NSD/subj01_things.npy', allow_pickle=True\)
print\('Shape:', things.shape\)
# Count label distribution
from collections import Counter
flat_labels = []
for item in things:
    if isinstance\(item, \(list, np.ndarray\)\):
        for l in item:
            flat_labels.append\(str\(l\)\)
    else:
        flat_labels.append\(str\(item\)\)
c = Counter\(flat_labels\)
print\(f'Total unique labels: {len\(c\)}'\)
print\('Top 20 labels:'\)
for label, count in c.most_common\(20\):
    print\(f'  {label}: {count}'\)
")
